original_title: Mark of the Devil 777: The Moralist, Part 2
overview: Twenty-five years after she first encountered evil, reporter Meredith O'Brien (Karen Dilloo) again finds herself in danger, only now her daughter and other victims who survived near death assaults years ago are on the hit list of a bumbling Satanic Cult.
title: Mark of the Devil 777: The Moralist, Part 2
